main event: Witnesses reported observing a bright, circular object in the sky that was about 25-30 feet in diameter and hovered, then shot away at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object made no sound and left no trail.
The Air Force investigation was inconclusive and could not determine what the UFOs were.
The Air Force requested more information from the witness to evaluate the report.
The report is from Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's official program for investigating UFO sightings.
